text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: I bet Machitan swapped out her engine!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? I don't even have one installed!?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: But you zoomed past me like vroom! You're definitely up to something!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, even if you say that, I'm just doing things as usual and normally...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I mean, I eat normally, sleep normally, train normally—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And besides that, my trainer's just been teaching me all sorts of things like how to use my legs and race mindset.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, I see, I see. Even if I'm normal, my trainer's no ordinary person...!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: So that means Machitan's trainer is Machitan's engine!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow, my trainer is my engine...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Heheh, it feels like we're in this together, two legs and three feet!
That day, Matikanetannhauser thanked her over and over again!
